channel.title: When adding polypore-CCbow
channel.description:
[code]starting... src\com\rs\game\player\actions\PlayerCombat.java:2713: error: illegal start of e xpression || name.contains("Polypore staff") ^ src\com\rs\game\player\actions\PlayerCombat.java:2715: error: not a statement || name.contains("Chaotic Crossbow") ^ src\com\rs\game\player\actions\PlayerCombat.java:2715: error: ';' expected || name.contains("Chaotic Crossbow") ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Thats error this is file. [code] * 0 not ranging, 1 invalid ammo so stops att, 2 can range, 3 no ammo */ public static final int isRanging(Player player) { int weaponId = player.getEquipment().getWeaponId(); if (weaponId == -1) return 0; String name = ItemDefinitions.getItemDefinitions(weaponId).getName(); if (name != null) { // those dont need arrows if (name.contains("knife") || name.contains("dart") || name.contains("javelin") || name.contains("thrownaxe") || name.contains("throwing axe") || name.contains("Crystal bow") || name.contains("Zaryte bow")) || name.contains("Polypore staff") || name.contains("Polypore staff (degraded)") || name.contains("Chaotic Crossbow") return 2;
[/code]
thats only part with error

item.title: When adding polypore-CCbow
item.dc:creator: @Demolitionx711 Demolitionx711
item.description:
@Demolitionx711 wrote:

starting... src\com\rs\game\player\actions\PlayerCombat.java:2713: error: illegal start of e xpression || name.contains("Polypore staff") ^ src\com\rs\game\player\actions\PlayerCombat.java:2715: error: not a statement || name.contains("Chaotic Crossbow") ^ src\com\rs\game\player\actions\PlayerCombat.java:2715: error: ';' expected || name.contains("Chaotic Crossbow") ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Thats error this is file.

	 * 0 not ranging, 1 invalid ammo so stops att, 2 can range, 3 no ammo
	 */
	public static final int isRanging(Player player) {
		int weaponId = player.getEquipment().getWeaponId();
		if (weaponId == -1)
			return 0;
		String name = ItemDefinitions.getItemDefinitions(weaponId).getName();
		if (name != null) { // those dont need arrows
			if (name.contains("knife") || name.contains("dart")
					|| name.contains("javelin") || name.contains("thrownaxe")
					|| name.contains("throwing axe")
					|| name.contains("Crystal bow")
					|| name.contains("Zaryte bow"))
					|| name.contains("Polypore staff")
					|| name.contains("Polypore staff (degraded)")				
					|| name.contains("Chaotic Crossbow")
				return 2;

thats only part with error

Read full topic
